title: Ashe: Warmother vol. 2 is awesome!
body:
I'm so happy to reading this comics! I very like it!

I can't said anything for not spoiler who are waiting the volume in the Universe, but dammit...is so cool! Good job Odin and the others stuff!

Who already read the comic? I want to talk sooo bad!

~~sorry for bad english btw.~~

replies.body:
I wanted her to live.

I also want to see a comic with Lissandra in it now, more than ever.
Definitely awesome. I knew Maalcrom was a traitor. I KNEW IT! Honestly, I love Ashe. I really didn't care about her before but now? Ugh she's such a badass! Honestly, I need more comics :')!
I loved it too, but it's pretty hard to wait a month for every chapter {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

> [{quoted}](name=DriveGuido,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=d2kp3Boj,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-01-16T23:11:09.621+0000)
>
> I loved it too, but it's pretty hard to wait a month for every chapter {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

They will be coming out much sooner if people read them and buy them..
All the support counts :) Tell your friends who enjoy comics, great way to start learnig about the League universe even if theyre not playing the game
Im glad you like it, I loved it aswell great writing and Its fascinating how Ashe came to get that bow and how she survived the conflict with Maalcrom :)
